thread.title: BRIEF-Eagle Point Credit Q1 GAAP Net Income Of $0.39 Per Weighted Average Common Share

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Eagle Point Credit Q1 GAAP Net Income Of $0.39 Per Weighted Average Common Share
text:
May 17 (Reuters) - Eagle Point Credit Company Inc:
* ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * QTRLY NET INVESTMENT INCOME AND REALIZED CAPITAL GAINS OF $0.50 PER WEIGHTED AVERAGE COMMON SHARE
* Q1 2018 GAAP NET INCOME (INCLUSIVE OF UNREALIZED MARK-TO-MARKET LOSSES) OF $0.39 PER WEIGHTED AVERAGE COMMON SHARE
* EAGLE POINT CREDIT COMPANY- NAV AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 $355.2 MILLION, OR $16.65 PER COMMON SHARE, $0.48 PER COMMON SHARE LOWER THAN COâ€™S NAV AS OF MARCH 31, 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
